goal.ch: 神經生物學課程旨在講授神經細胞之生理、生化，及各類神經系統包括感官、動作、睡眠、情緒、學習等。
goal.en: This introductory course will cover the structure and function of the nervous system at cellular and system levels. Throughout the course, the instructor will cover cellular physiology of neuron, sensory systems, motor system, sleep, emotion, as well as learning and memory.
